spells.effect: Stronger variation of the Unlocking Charm

spells.name: Altering Spell
spells.effect: Transformed the physical form or colour of objects

spells.name: Anapneo
spells.effect: Cleared target's airway by vanishing blockages

spells.name: Animagus Spell
spells.effect: Used as part of the ritual to become an Animagus

spells.name: Anti-Disapparition Jinx
spells.effect: Prevented Disapparition within a certain area

spells.name: Arrow Shooting Spell
spells.effect: Conjures a shooting arrow from the caster's wand

spells.name: Atmospheric Charm
spells.effect: Modified or created certain weather conditions

spells.name: Avenseguim
spells.effect: Turned the object into a tracking device

spells.name: Badgering
spells.effect: Turns target human into a badger

spells.name: Basic Cast
spells.effect: Caused damage or harm to targets

spells.name: Bat-Bogey Hex
spells.effect: Transformed target's bogeys into bats that flew out of the victim's nose

spells.name: Bewitched Snowballs
spells.effect: Bewitches snowballs to follow and harass a designated target

spells.name: Boggart-Banishing Spell
spells.effect: Turned a Boggart into something amusing

spells.name: Brackium Emendo
spells.effect: Removes bones (according to Gilderoy Lockhart, it cures bones)

spells.name: Broom jinx
spells.effect: Made a broomstick attempt to buck its rider off

spells.name: Bubble Spell
spells.effect: Created a stream of non-bursting bubbles

spells.name: Caterwauling Charm
spells.effect: Sets off a high-pitched shriek if entered

spells.name: Cauldron to badger
spells.effect: Transformed a cauldron into a badger

spells.name: Cauldron to Sieve
spells.effect: Turned a cauldron into a sieve

spells.name: Concealment Charm
spells.effect: Conceals things from view and obfuscates inherent magical properties of objects

spells.name: Confusion Hex
spells.effect: Significantly impairs foes by weakening their mental awareness

spells.name: Cribbing Spell
spells.effect: Assists the caster in cheating on written papers

spells.name: Cruciatus Curse
spells.effect: Excruciating physical pain, insanity if victim was subjected for too long

spells.name: Curse of the Bogies
spells.effect: Nasty cold and an extremely runny nose

spells.name: Cushioning Charm
spells.effect: Placed a cushioning effect on an object

spells.name: Dangling Jinx
spells.effect: Suspends people by the ankles in the air

spells.name: Disintegration spell
spells.effect: Blew up and disintegrated the target

spells.name: Drought Charm
spells.effect: Dried up small bodies of water

spells.name: Dumbledore's Army parchment jinx
spells.effect: Caused boils to spell 'SNEAK' on the face of a traitor

spells.name: Everte Statum
spells.effect: Made opponent stumble, Caused sharp pain

spells.name: False memory spell
spells.effect: Implanted a false memory in the victim's mind

spells.name: Flagrante Curse
spells.effect: Causes objects to burn on contact

spells.name: Flipendo Maxima
spells.effect: Knocks the target back with greater force than the Knockback Jinx

spells.name: Foundables Spell
spells.effect: Unleashed the Calamity upon the Wizarding world; created foundables

spells.name: Freezing Charm
spells.effect: Stopped movement and actions of the target

spells.name: Fur spell
spells.effect: Causes fur to grow on someone

spells.name: Hair-Thickening Charm
spells.effect: Caused hair to grow longer and thicker

spells.name: Homing spell
spells.effect: Offensive spells that caused damage; would follow their target

spells.name: Homonculous Charm
spells.effect: When cast onto a map, it enabled tracking the movements of every person in the mapped area

spells.name: Homorphus Charm
spells.effect: May temporarily change a transformed werewolf back into their human form (according to Gilderoy Lockhart, it cures lycanthropy)

spells.name: Horcrux-making spell
spells.effect: Prepared a receptacle to become a Horcrux

spells.name: Horn Tongue Hex
spells.effect: Transformed target's tongue into a horn

spells.name: Horton-Keitch Braking Charm
spells.effect: Allow broomsticks to brake more easily

spells.name: Hurling Hex
spells.effect: Causes a broomstick to attempt to hurl its rider off

spells.name: Ice Jinx
spells.effect: Generated a small block of ice

spells.name: Ignition Spell
spells.effect: Lights a target using a small fireball

spells.name: Inanimatus Conjurus Spell
spells.effect: Alters the design of a room

spells.name: Insect Hex
spells.effect: Gives target insectoid qualities for a short period of time

spells.name: Intruder Charm
spells.effect: Detects intruders and sounds an alarm

spells.name: Knockback Jinx
spells.light: Blue, orange, yellow red, purple or white

spells.name: Langlock
spells.effect: Stuck tongue to roof of the mouth

spells.name: Legilimency Spell
spells.effect: Let caster see into the mind of another person

spells.name: Liberacorpus
spells.light: Flash of light of unknown colour

spells.name: Lumos Duo
spells.effect: Focused beam of light from end of wand

spells.name: Lumos Maxima
spells.effect: Produced very bright light from wand tip

spells.name: Meteolojinx recanto
spells.effect: Caused weather effects caused by spells to cease

spells.name: Ministry of Magic Fog
spells.effect: Produced special fog for the concealment of certain locations

spells.name: Morsmordre
spells.effect: Conjured the Dark Mark in the sky

spells.name: One-Eyed Witch Spell
spells.effect: Revealed secret passages, particularly the One-Eyed Witch Passage

spells.name: Orbis
spells.effect: Sucks the target into the ground

spells.name: Pain extraction spell
spells.effect: Removed pain from the target, Could empower those who absorbed it

spells.name: Prior Incantato
spells.effect: Showed the previous spells cast by a wand

spells.name: Proficiency Charm
spells.effect: Boosts an individual's performance with certain talents

spells.name: Protego Diabolica
spells.effect: Encircling the caster with a protective ring of black fire that incinerated enemies and left allies unharmed

spells.name: Pus Squirting Hex
spells.effect: Caused yellowish pus to squirt from one's nose

spells.name: Reparifarge
spells.effect: Reverses the effects of an incomplete Transformation spell

spells.name: Repello Inimicum
spells.effect: Repels enemies; if used with Protego Maxima and Fianto Duri, it disintegrates anything that comes in contact with the barrier

spells.name: Revelio Charm
spells.effect: Revealed secrets about a person or object

spells.name: Reverte
spells.effect: Returns objects to their original positions or states

spells.name: Rose Growth
spells.effect: Accelerates the growth of a rosebush

spells.name: Rowboat spell
spells.effect: Caused a rowboat to propel itself

spells.name: Scouring Charm
spells.effect: Cleaned objects, Caused human mouths to fill with soap

spells.name: Sea Urchin Jinx
spells.effect: Makes tiny spikes erupt all over the victim

spells.name: Seize and pull charm
spells.effect: Pulled something towards the caster or vice versa

spells.name: Shield Charm
spells.effect: Reflected spells and blocked physical forces
spells.light: Invisible on its own, reflected light of spell

spells.name: Shield penetration spell
spells.effect: Used to break down magical shields

spells.name: Skurge Charm
spells.effect: Cleaned ectoplasm, Frightened ghosts and other spirits

spells.name: Slowing Charm
spells.effect: Slowed or stopped the target's velocity

spells.name: Smashing Spell
spells.effect: Explosive, destroyed everything in its range

spells.name: Sonorous Charm
spells.effect: Emitted a magnified roar from the tip of the wand

spells.name: Specialis Revelio
spells.effect: Revealed spells cast on objects or potions

spells.name: Sponge-Knees Curse
spells.effect: Causes the target's legs to become spongy

spells.name: Taboo
spells.effect: When a word was spoken, the caster was alerted and protective enchantments around the speaker were weakened

spells.name: Teacup to tortoise
spells.effect: Transformed a teacup into a tortoise

spells.name: Teapot to tortoise
spells.effect: Transforms a teapot into a tortoise

spells.name: Toenail-growing hex
spells.effect: Causes its victim's toenails to grow alarmingly fast

spells.name: Tracking spell
spells.effect: Revealed traces of magic, including footprints and track marks

spells.name: Transmogrifian Torture
spells.effect: Tortured, possibly by transfiguring the target to death

spells.name: Unbreakable Vow
spells.effect: Magical vow, that was fatal if broken

spells.name: Unsupported flight
spells.effect: Allowed a witch or wizard to fly unaided

spells.name: Vacuum cleaner spell
spells.effect: Cleans an object like a vacuum cleaner

spells.name: Ventus Duo
spells.effect: Creates a stronger jet of wind compared to Ventus

spells.name: Verdillious
spells.effect: Caused the wand tip to burn like a sparkler whilst damaging an opponent

spells.name: Verdimillious Charm
spells.effect: Do damage to opponents, Reveal hidden things

spells.name: Verdimillious Duo Spell
spells.effect: Do damage to an opponent, Revealed hidden objects
